doc.title: Erotic Cuts
doc.plot: Over the years, Greenwood Cooper has shot hundreds of hours of footage for its nearly 100 video releases. Much of this footage has never made it past the editing room due to the more "steamy" material it contained. So, we've gone back to our archives and found samplings of hot, sensual scenes from several of these popular titles. Finally, these erotic, uncut scenes have been put together for your viewing pleasure.
